metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0500 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Curl_smtp_escape_eob in lib/smtp.c in curl 7.54.1 to and including curl7.60.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow that might be exploitable by anattacker who can control the data that curl transmits over SMTP withcertain settings (i.e., use of a nonstandard --limit-rate argument orCURLOPT_BUFFERSIZE value).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0500` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.2
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.2
libcurl3-nss - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.2
libcurl4 - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.58.0-2ubuntu3.2').
